Text: ACT conversion rate Cc Dear CEO Kenneth Lay The conversion rate of is not acceptable to shareholders It should be at least or above We need to get bidders and more banks to back up Enron while talking to Dynergy ratio was proposed by some analysts who short the ENE stocks when the price was at above The number was published in media again last week or so ENE should not take this outrage number These hedge fund and short sellers will be happy if the ratio is I think ratio is our bottom line May god gives you wisdom Peter
